paper_abstract: By making use of fuzzy inclusion order, the notions of bases (subbases) for three enriched L-topologies including stratified L-topologies, strong L-topologies and Alexandrov L-topologies, are presented. Some characterizations for these notions are given. The results exhibit many different features from the base (subbase) in L-topologies. Some non-trivial examples including a base for the topologically generated (stratified, strong) L-topologies and a base for the Alexandrov L-topologies derived from L-fuzzy rough sets, are constructed. At last, an application in open and continuous functions is offered.
paper_title: On enriched L-topologies: Base and subbase
